channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Universal Plugin Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Universal Plugin Manager

item.title: CVE-2018-5229|2024-09-17T03:18:22.247Z -- atlassian -- universal%20plugin%20manager
item.description: The NotificationRepresentationFactoryImpl class in Atlassian Universal Plugin Manager before version 2.22.9 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML or JavaScript via a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the name of user submitted add-on names.

item.title: CVE-2019-14999|2024-09-17T02:05:32.904Z -- atlassian -- universal%20plugin%20manager
item.description: The Uninstall REST endpoint in Atlassian Universal Plugin Manager before version 2.22.19, from version 3.0.0 before version 3.0.3 and from version 4.0.0 before version 4.0.3 allows remote attackers to uninstall plugins using a Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability on an authenticated administrator.
